heading: Mandatory stop work orders
text:
The commissioner shall issue stop work orders in the circumstances set forth below.
   Upon issuance of such stop work order, the work shall immediately stop and shall not resume until the stop work order is
   rescinded by the department. The stop work order shall not be rescinded less than two business days after the date of issuance of
   such order. Nothing in the following sections shall be construed to limit the commissionerâ€™s power to issue stop work orders in
   other circumstances.
